sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-clocks-container', templateUrl: './clocks-container.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clocks-container.component.scss'] }) export class ClocksContainerComponent { clocks = [ { id: 1, hour: 20, minute: 14, second: 8, city: 'Jerusalem' }, { id: 2, hour: 16, minute: 7, second: 0, city: 'London' }, { id: 3, hour: 8, minute: 9, second: 0, city: 'Manhattan' }, { id: 4, hour: 6, minute: 5, second: 0, city: 'Tokyo' }, ]; }
